channel.title: Help i cant run my cleint or client compiler!
channel.description:
ok i get this error for the run and compile in the client:
'Java' is not reconized as an internal or external commands, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
For the compiler i get this:
'Javac' is not reconized as an internal or external commands, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...
I know i need to go into edit then change something there to be able to run it. heres what i have now:
Run.Edit:
@echo off title PhoneScape Client java -cp . EGUI pause
Compiler.Edit:
@echo off Title PhoneScape Client Compiler java -cp .;sign *.javac -nowarn *.java pause
PLZ HELP ME!

item.title: Help i cant run my cleint or client compiler!

@Monkey_wacko wrote:

I have both those duh…! I cant get it to run thats all!

Read full topic

item.title: Help i cant run my cleint or client compiler!
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Monkey wacko:

No i still need Help!

Click here for Mod Taharok’s ‘perfect’ compiler version 1.9. You need this.

You also need to download JDK 6u1. Download it here.

To edit your files, you need to extract it out of winrar. Highlight your source and click “Extract to” and extract it to your desktop. Open it there and you will be able to edit things.

Read full topic
